name: Dedenne

passive.name: Cheek Pouch
passive.effect: When Dedenne eats a Berry, in addition to its effects, remove 2 damage counters from Dedenne.

attacks.name: Tiny Jolt
attacks.effect: If you have any Electric Pokemon on your Bench, this attack does 20 more damage.

flavor: Happy to just eat berries, these Pokemon are sometimes kept by non-Trainers as pets.
